mapper.select: select c.* from user_role a left join role_permission b on (a.role_name = b.role_name) left join permission c on (b.permission_str = c.permission_str) where a.username = #{username}
select b.* from role_permission a left join permission b on (a.permission_str = b.permission_str) where a.role_name = #{roleName} order by b.id
select count(1) from permission where permission_str=#{permissionStr}

SELECT a.id AS permission_id, a.sys_name, a.title, a.permission_str, a.resources_type, a.description, a.create_at, a.update_at,
b.id AS web_permission_id, b.need_authorization, b.target_class, b.target_method, b.target_method_params, b.resources_url, b.target_exist FROM permission a LEFT JOIN web_permission b ON (a.permission_str = b.permission_str) WHERE a.permission_str=#{permissionStr}
